translations: n．火车尾部车厢（复数形式）：火车的最后一节车厢，通常用于乘务员休息、办公和观察火车运行情况。
· The train had two cabooses at the end.

sentences.sentence: Described are the technical parameters, structure features, main structure and testing of the cabooses exported to Pakistan.
sentences.translation: 介绍了出口巴基斯坦守车的技术参数、结构特点、主要结构及试验情况。
